Method Detail

addAction

public void addAction(Action action)
Adds given action to actionQueue. This function also processes other actions according to type of action;

Parameters:
action - Action to add actionQueue

logout

public void logout()
Logouts current user and return to main window(login screen)

initializeSession

public void initializeSession()
Gets session objects from server and hands it to application manager. Session Object is consist of open window locations, all ToDo and Note Lists (id's and names only) and current user.

sync

public void sync()
Sends action list to server and process result list.
